mapper.select: SELECT I.ITEMID, I.PRODUCTID, UNITCOST, DESCRIPTION, VIEWCOUNT, QTY, DISCOUNT, LISTPRICE, I.USERID AS "item.userId", I.PRODUCTID AS "item.productId", FROM ITEM I, HANDMADE H WHERE H.ITEMID = I.ITEMID AND I.PRODUCTID = #{value}
SELECT I.PRODUCTID, I.ITEMID, I.USERID, I.TITLE, I.QTY, I.UNITCOST, I.DESCRIPTION, I.VIEWCOUNT, LISTPRICE FROM ITEM I, HANDMADE H WHERE I.ITEMID = H.ITEMID
